doc: add go command notes to the Go 1 doc

Fixes issue 2912.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

http://codereview.appspot.com/5783048/diff/1/doc/go1.tmpl
File doc/go1.tmpl (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5783048/diff/1/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode1970
doc/go1.tmpl:1970: Projects that depend on the Go project's old makefile-based build
make this an Updating: paragraph

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

PTAL

http://codereview.appspot.com/5783048/diff/1/doc/go1.tmpl
File doc/go1.tmpl (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5783048/diff/1/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode1970

> make this an Updating: paragraph

Done.
